fixed_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Magarudyne

innate_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Garudyne

innate_skill.desc: 65.1/68.4/71.6% chance to inflict Forget on 1 foe for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Makajama

passive_skill.desc: When dealing Wind damage to a foe, 80% chance to deal bonus damage equal to 4.2% of the foe's max HP (up to 33.6% of Attack).
passive_skill.name: Wings of Menace

passive_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 7.0%.
passive_skill.name: Spell Master III

passive_skill.desc: When dealing Wind damage to a foe, deal bonus damage equal to 4.2% of the foe's max HP (up to 33.6% of Attack).
passive_skill.name: Greater Wings of Menace

passive_skill.desc: Increase chance of inflicting Windswept by 6.3%.
passive_skill.name: Windsweep Boost III

passive_skill.desc: After knocking down a foe, increase Wind damage by 11.5% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Wind Fervor III

passive_skill.desc: When dealing Wind damage to a foe, deal bonus damage equal to 5.2% of the foe's max HP (up to 41.6% of Attack).
passive_skill.name: Lord of Mt. Kurama

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
